text: Swiss International Air Lines is the flag carrier of Switzerland. It began on March 31, 2002; the day after Swissair declared bankruptcy. The airline has nonstop flights throughout Switzerland, Europe, Africa, America and Asia. It's currently owned by Lufthansa. ==References== Category:Star Alliance Category:2002 establishments in Europe Category:Airlines of Europe Category:Transport companies of Switzerland Category:Companies based in Basel Category:IATA members
title: Swiss International Air Lines
